subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick and Mardy Fish will lead the United States in a Davis Cup quarterfinal against Spain, along with the doubles team of Bob and Mike Bryan, the captain, Jim Courier, announced.
snippet: Andy Roddick and Mardy Fish will lead the United States in a Davis Cup quarterfinal against Spain, along with the doubles team of Bob and Mike Bryan, the captain, Jim Courier, announced.
